My Bible

Quotes to live by

  • The greatest success goes to the person who is not afraid to fail in front of even the largest audience. Bill Hewlett
  • The best time to plant a tree is twenty years ago. The second best time is now

Jack Kinsella calls himself an analyst because it's suitably nondescript and affords him the possibility of being inconsistent in interests. He owns Oxbridge Notes, co-founded of Bolivian Express, and co-organises the elite private marketing group, Growth Hacker Berlin. Follow me if you enjoyed my writing.
